Forms Contact Us Apply Online Request Info Visit Campus DePaul University>Admission & Aid>Financial Aid>Maintain Eligibility Maintaining Eligibility You've worked hard to secure your financial aid, and now you need to meet the requirements necessary to keep it coming. When you receive federal or state financial aid, you're required to make measurable progress toward your degree in order to continue receiving it. This requirement is calledSatisfactory Academic Progress (SAP). In addition to clarifying the SAP requirements, we'll also address: Returning Title IV aid Consequences ofwithdrawing from classes Limits and maximumsfor federal and state financial aid programs Complyingwith terms and conditions
